casebody.data:
No. 10-583. John Ayanbadejo, et ux., Petitioners v. Janet Napolitano, Secretary of Homeland Security, et al. 562 U.S. 1265, 131 S. Ct. 1594,

179 L. Ed. 2d 491,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1768. February 28, 2011.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 1138, 131 S. Ct. 933, 178 L. Ed. 2d 753, 2011 U.S. LEXIS 397.
